sentence.Network_en: Capitalistic whole society function was carried out now by employed employee.
sentence.Network_cn: 资本家的全部社会职能现在由雇的职员来执行了.

sentence.Network_en: This kind of life attitude is especially reflected in a capitalistic society.
sentence.Network_cn: 这样的生活态度,尤其反映在资本主义社会.

sentence.Network_en: The parole originating from capitalistic punishment system is an important way of enforcement of punishment.
sentence.Network_cn: 假释制度是近代资产阶级刑罚制度的产物,是一项重要的行刑制度.

PerfectNetExp.abs: in most work success is measured by income and while our capitalistic society continues , this is inevitable .在多数工作中，收入的多少是衡量成功与否的标准，当我们这个资本主义社会继续存在时，这是不可避免的。
capitalist 资本主义性质, capitalistic 有资本主义特征的, capitalistic 平等
China , a third world country , is a special case ; it has progressed rapidly with capitalistic socialism .中国的情况比较特殊，作为第三世界国家，发展迅猛，走资本主义路线的社会主义。

list.abs: socialist economy 社会主义经济capitalist economy 资本主义经济collective economy 集体经济
但随着信息时代风险投资的兴起, 风险资本家(venture capitalist) 又使资本家的概念有了新的内涵。在信用不发达的时代, 只有有钱人才.
风险投资家（Venture Capitalist）：以高投入追求高回报。苹果电脑公司CEO乔布斯是一个典型。
银行及其新功能词汇详解2 _... ... a handful of 少数；少量 capitalist imperialism 资本帝国主义 affiliated bank 附属银行.
historical review of the capitalist world system and its hegemonic supersession ., 资本主义世界体系的历史考察及其霸权更迭.

entry.def: Capitalistic means supporting or based on the principles of capitalism.

means.word_mean: 2. of or relating to capitalism or capitalists;
